introduction: You can book the extended practical driving test online. You’ll need to have passed your theory test first.
more_information:
^You can use the online booking service between 6am and midnight.^

You’ll need:

- your valid Great Britain or Northern Ireland provisional driving licence number
- a theory test pass date and certificate number

You'll also need a credit or debit card to pay. Only the following types of card are accepted:

- Delta
- MasterCard
- Visa
- Visa Electron
overview: Book the extended practical driving test online. You’ll need to have passed your theory test first.
title: Take the extended practical driving test
